page.title: 10HUNTS FARM
page.content: {Hunts Farm}has about 300 acres of land of which 225 acres are taken up by cereals. These consist of 161 acres of winter wheat, 19 of winter barley, 11 of spring barley, 14 winter beans, 16 of peas and 4 of tick beans. The rest of the acreage is taken up by woodland,rough grazing and permanent pasture. They fatten 10,000 pigs a year for a pig producer,named Robert Bowden. The pigs are fattened to the weight of 35 or 70 kilos. The 70 kilo pig is used for joints and things like pork pies. The general purpose pig takes 50_55 days to put on 30_35 kgs. They have 3 full time workers earning Â£90_Â£100 a week, 2 part time workers both former full time workers now retired. One of them lives in a tied cottage.
